body: and also forget to mention the art is really unique. the artstlye is really a suitable with the story itself. the art is really cute but really erotic at the same time. the artstlye is the one that you can enjoyed as a wholesome story and the one that you can fap to. im really amaze that there is something like this where the art is cute and erotic at the same time. its 9/10
